content.rendered:
The Alpine Bar Stool has a Beech frame & a 2 year structural guarantee.

Similar in style to some of our best selling products the Maple range offers a bar stool, armchair and side chair.

Ideal to be used in busy bars, hotels and restaurants but can be placed in any commercial environment.

This is a high quality, commercial grade chair, which comes in selections of faux leather.

This chair only comes in the finishes shown, for more options look at our Made To Order Alpine Bar Stool.
